row.process:
!:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_JAVA_PROPERTIES.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :SET &CMD# = "" :IF &UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_VALUE# <> "" : SET &CMD# = '-v "&UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_VALUE#" ' :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SET_ENCODING_CMD# <> "" : SET &CMD# = STR_CAT(&CMD#, '-enc &UC4RB_SET_ENCODING_CMD# ') :ENDIF
java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#java-properties-tool.jar" properties UpdateCreateProperty -prop "&UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_FILENAME#" -var "&UC4RB_JAVA_PROP_NAME#" &CMD#
